The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Mr. Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Mr. Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Mr. Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Mr. Eric Schmidt , 55, will become executive chairman and remain available to advise Mr. Page, 37, and Google Inc.

â¢ BUEHRLE BASHES VICK: White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, does not believe Eagles quarterback Michael Vick has been fully punished for his felony conviction for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle told MLB.com in a recent interview. "Everything you've done to these dogs, something bad needs to happen to these guys." The story, which was published on Wednesday, centered around
